## Utils.prefix() function

Prefix an optional string.

If `prefix` or `s` have no length then `s` is returned as-is. Otherwise the strings are concatenated.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function prefix(prefix?: string, s?: string): string | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  prefix | string | _(Optional)_ the prefix to prepend to <code>s</code> |
|  s | string | _(Optional)_ the string to append to <code>prefix</code> |

**Returns:**

string \| undefined

the prefixed string, or `undefined` if `s` is undefined
